title: ASK MR. MOOTS–“WHAT’S THAT WELD ON MY SEAT TUBE?”
content:
In this edition of “Ask Mr. Moots” series, our question comes from Moots dealers and customers alike. 

Dear Mr. Moots……I daydream about riding my Routt RSL when I’m doing something else. I drool over the welds and the attention …
